author: Devan Bhalla
author_info: Brand Builder & Marketer | IIM Merit Scholar | TEDx | Public Speaker | Cited Researcher | Launched over 40+ successful products | Growth & Analytics | Tune in on #DBytes on LinkedIn for more
content:
“How many tourists visit Jaipur in February?” – a question I was asked at #McKinsey and one that I wasn't really prepared for 😅
 
If you too are looking for guesstimates for your interview prep, then do check out this post and fill the form so that I can share the collated resource list with you. 
 
“How does Zara or Starbucks estimate their market size?” an intrigued student from Dyal Singh College, Delhi University asked me this question during a recent session.
 
All top consulting firms for that matter have interviews aligned on guesstimates – an approach to understand a firm’s market and strategize x number of things on it. 
 
Here’s how you can utilize a market analysis aspect to build on your case better:

 
▶️ Where to sell? 
 
Segment the market to find out volume vs value base along with the scope of the target market 
 
▶️ Whom to sell? 
 
Identify the customer types as per your product’s pricing and other factors. 
 
▶️ How to sell?
 
Position your product with the right strategy and demonstrate why an investor will invest in your firm. 
 
▶️ Additional factors like competition (Direct / Indirect / Replacement) along with macro-economic factors to be considered. 
 

Looking to ace your guesstimate game? 

Then fill this form and do tag a friend who might require this info: https://lnkd.in/dmNhtu-K
 

 
#guesstimates #colleges #consutling #analysis #DBytes

author: EY
content:
We are thrilled to be positioned as a leader in the latest Verdantix Green Quadrant: ESG & Sustainability Consulting 2022. 
The report evaluates 15 services providers and notes that EY ranks the highest of all participating firms for ESG and sustainability program strategy. EY supports many of its clients through its proprietary tools and models including the ESG Maturity model, Materiality assessment tool, EY Predict scenario modelling tool, EY climate governance maturity assessment, and EY decarbonization navigator. #BetterWorkingWorld #sustainability #ESG #leadership
